testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user goes to register page............................................passed When user selects gender type male or female................................passed And user enters first name and last name....................................passed And user enters the date of birth...........................................passed And user enters the email...................................................passed And user enters the password................................................passed And user enters the confirm password........................................passed And user clicks on register button..........................................passed Then success message is displayed...........................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: : user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid test@example.com and P@ssw0rd....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid higoodbye@example.com and password.............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed

testcase.classname: F03_currencies | users could check the appear of currency symbol

testcase.system-out: When user select currency from the dropdown list............................passed Then user check the appear of Euro symbol...................................passed
